name: The Legend Of Sadness pt.2
author: KesieV
description:
All the titles of The Legend Of Zelda series are stunningly aging very well, mostly because of their design, which hardly ages, but what surprises me is that there are few titles still around with the same genre.

People loves the Zelda formula - there are many indies lookalikes out there and one of the most successful demos of Akihabara, back to 2010, was The Legend Of Sadness, a very quick implementation of the Zelda mechanics.

Anyway, nothing is better than that game for improving again camera management with multiple scrolling directions and give to The Legend Of Sadness a second chapter! I've heavily used the excellent Tiled for making the dungeon, and a code generator for converting everything for Wright!.

Plot?

No! This time I've prepared a nice scroller after the title screen! Move Klin with UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT, attack with A BUTTON and switch weapon (when you've found that) with the B BUTTON!

set.html: YOU'VE FOUND THE BOMBS! NOW YOU CAN BREAK CRUMBLED WALLS!
PRESS B TO SWITCH ITEM AND A FOR USING IT.

object.html:
LONG LONG TIME AGO, A YOUNG BOY NAMED KLIN, WAS SENT BY ITS VILLAGE TO THE DARK CAVE IN ORDER TO SLAY A MENACING MONSTER.

BUT A TERRIBLE TRICK WAS PLAYED TO HIM AND HE WAS SEALED IN THE DUNGEON FOREVER.

A DARK SPIRIT DECIDED TO HELP HIM AND REVEALED WHERE THE FIRST PIECE OF THE TRIVENGE, A POWERFUL ITEM THAT CAN GRANT ANY WISH, WAS HIDDEN.

WHEN KLIN TOUCHED THE TRIVENGE PIECE, EVERYTHING BECAME BLACK AND FAINTED.

'THE TRIVENGE OF LIFE' SAID THE DARK SPIRIT 'WILL LET YOU DIE'.

KLIN HEART STARTED SLOWING DOWN LITTLE BY LITTLE.

'SHOW HIM ALL YOUR RAGE. SHOW HIM YOU WANT TO LIVE AND GET YOUR REVENGE'.

KLIN FACE BECAME PALE. HIS HEART STOPPED.



BUT THEN...
